data.name: Coloring Pixels - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Coloring Pixels Official Soundtrack

The official soundtrack for Coloring Pixels captures the relaxed nature of the game. This soundtrack gives you access to Coloring Pixel's array of purposefully composed piano tracks to listen to at your leisure.

Album lasts for approximately 60 minutes and is composed by various artists.

Tracks Included

  • Seconds Of Daylight - 5:07
  • Time Forever - 4:58
  • Minutes Of The World - 4:56
  • Happy Pixels - 5:21
  • Blue Pixels - 5:18
  • Plenty Of Pixels - 5:18
  • Coloring Lead Me Astray - 5:16
  • Incomplete Coloring - 5:17
  • Coloring Satisfaction - 5:12
  • Late Night Pixel Art - 5:04
  • Discovering Pixel Art - 5:12
  • Window Into Art - 5:07

data.short_description: The official soundtrack for Coloring Pixels! This soundtrack gives you access to Coloring Pixel's array of relaxing music to listen to at your leisure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
